---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/solana/merge-stake-account/get-flow-status-merge-stake-account
pagination_next: null
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://solana-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/07fa6b05-476e-493e-aa02-0d855fe98b78' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `merge_tx_broadcasting` to `completed`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {4}
{
  "id": "07fa6b05-476e-493e-aa02-0d855fe98b78",
  "operation": "merge_stake_account",
  "state": "completed",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "destination_stake_account_pubkey": "9UPYJp5pApSEaeCizrvqe6vx7hSj3ZPzVDLZHG4hxk3x",
    "source_stake_account_pubkey": "23ANo1epPVGhGHyfsJP9581nNULGK7UoM7LPFyhx45Ss",
    "stake_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "merge_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "HAtWyX8EPwCQZZpdazBLrj1ZwZxCtMHWEekDC34GMVx9Rx4q6CaVSBSpMwbJR2Hn11UdRrZMacELB2TDBQ9wXgj",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": "2023-02-28T09:19:06.000Z"
    }
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "devnet",
  "created_at": "2023-02-28T09:12:59.071Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-28T09:19:20.817Z"
}
```

### Merge Stake Account Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully merge your two stake accounts into one stake account!
